messages: Thank you for noticing me.  So you're back from the dead, right?  Takiyasha is powerful, but it's all for naught.
Ever wondered why I'm down here?  I love the sweet smell of the flowers Melquiades collects.
Oh hi again.  Ever noticed those bald guys who light the ritual flame?  It seems they drop extra life on death.
You've made it far, but there's no salvation here.  You would have done better to just rot away.
